item.title: KAS Chartered Accountant
item.description:
About Us

KAS Chartered Accountant offers comprehensive financial services including financial statements preparation, taxation filing, payroll management, and corporate secretarial and advisory services. Our expertise ensures compliance and strategic financial planning for businesses of all sizes.

Our Services

  • Financial Statements: Professional preparation of financial statements and reports
  • Taxation Filing: Comprehensive tax preparation and filing services
  • Payroll Management: Complete payroll processing and management solutions
  • Corporate Services: Secretarial and advisory services for businesses

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Kevon Sieusankar
  • Phone: 309-9994
  • Email: ksieusankar@gmail.com

item.title: Avid Business Solutions
item.description:
About Us

Avid Business Solutions offers comprehensive services in accounting, taxation, and business registrations, including the incorporation of companies. With a focus on personalized service and expert advice, we help businesses navigate their financial needs efficiently.

Our Services

  • Accounting: Professional accounting services for businesses of all sizes
  • Taxation: Expert tax planning and compliance services
  • Business Registrations: Assistance with all aspects of business registration
  • Company Incorporation: Complete company incorporation and setup services

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Sabita Seelochan-Mohammed
  • Phone: 310-9624
  • Email: ss.mohammed20@hotmail.com

item.title: Tucana Business Services Ltd.
item.description:
About Us

Tucana Business Services Ltd. offers comprehensive accounting, business consultancy, and taxation services tailored to meet the unique needs of each client. With expertise in compliance and real estate, we provide strategic solutions that drive business success.

Our Services

  • Accounting Services: Full-service accounting and bookkeeping
  • Business Consultancy: Strategic planning and business advice
  • Taxation Services: Tax planning and compliance
  • Compliance Services: Regulatory compliance and reporting
  • Real Estate Services: Real estate consulting and advisory

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Kevin Leonce
  • Phone: +18683749747
  • Email: tucanabusinessservices@gmail.com
